import React from 'react' import { useSelector,useDispatch } from "react-redux" import "../CSS/Cart.css" function Cart() { const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const handleremovefromcart = (cartItem)=>{ } return (
{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? (

Shpping Cart Is Empty

Start Shopping
) : (<>
Shopping Cart
{cart.cartItems?.map((cartItem) => (
{cartItem.name}
${cartItem.price}
{cartItem.cartQuantity}
handleremovefromcart(cartItem)} href="" className='trash'>
${cartItem.price * cartItem.cartQuantity}
))}
Summury
Subtotal
$999
)}
) } export default Cart
